channel.title: [317] Zulf's Client [317]
channel.description:
This is just a blank client from http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,427460.msg3139096.html#msg3139096 so I don't think I'd need any images of ingame, so I'll just screenie what I added.
[b]What I added:[/b] - Cleaned up Class8.java(No custom models) - Added IP Changer, Port Changer, UID Changer(100% to me); - Organized sprites - Type 'settings' in-game and the settings window will pop up
[b]How to modify:[/b] The GUI for the settings window is in Zulf.java, loaded up in TitleBar.java (Frame_Sub1.java)
[b]Picture:[/b] [IMG]http://imgur.com/HP7Cx.png[/img] ^ Fix up the 'Settings' window size in TitleBar.java (Frame_Sub1.java) it's in the method 'loadSettings()'
[b]Download:[/b] http://www.mediafire.com/?rohuf87yc99jnbb
Thanks for viewing my post. - Zulf

item.title: [317] Zulf's Client [317]
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

That seems fair enough. I know their is a Tutortial on it. Though it’s like more than Two years old at least; I would look it up for you. I don’t feel like searching for a Two Year old thread to be honest. 0.0

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Zulf's Client [317]
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Demons Pure Demons
item.description:
@Pure_Demons wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:8, topic:363840”][quote author=Pure Demons link=topic=460082.msg3366432#msg3366432 date=1286829889]
Thanks for all the comments, and the fences are still gay I couldn’t manage to find a fresh cache.
[/quote]

I suppose you could find a Deltascape client that has the fix for it? You could rip out the model out of the client then add it to yours.[/quote]

Almost all clients nowwadays have them, unless they’re fresh DEOB. So I’ll have to find a new client, or find a cache.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Zulf's Client [317]
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Demons Pure Demons
item.description:
@Pure_Demons wrote:

This is just a blank client from http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,427460.msg3139096.html#msg3139096 so I don’t think I’d need any images of ingame, so I’ll just screenie what I added.

What I added:

  • Cleaned up Class8.java(No custom models)
  • Added IP Changer, Port Changer, UID Changer(100% to me);
  • Organized sprites
  • Type ‘settings’ in-game and the settings window will pop up

How to modify:
The GUI for the settings window is in Zulf.java, loaded up in TitleBar.java (Frame_Sub1.java)

Picture:

HP7Cx.png784×538

^ Fix up the ‘Settings’ window size in TitleBar.java (Frame_Sub1.java) it’s in the method ‘loadSettings()’

Download:
http://www.mediafire.com/?rohuf87yc99jnbb

Thanks for viewing my post.

  • Zulf

Read full topic
